google-build-namespaces.description:
Description

The
google-build-namespaces
check is an alias, please see
misc-anonymous-namespace-in-header
for more information.

Finds anonymous namespaces in headers.

https://google.github.io/styleguide/cppguide.html#Namespaces

Corresponding cpplint.py check name:
build/namespaces
.
google-build-namespaces.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
